techmeme.title: OpenAI raised $6.6B led by Thrive Capital in the largest VC deal of all time, valuing it at $157B, with participation from Microsoft, Nvidia, SoftBank, others (Ina Fried/Axios)
Poolside, which is building AI-assisted software development tools, raised a $500M Series B led by Bain Capital Ventures, reportedly at a $3B valuation (Bloomberg)
Sources: OpenAI has asked investors to avoid backing rival startups such as Anthropic and xAI (Financial Times)
OpenAI Raises $6.6 Billion in Funding at $157 Billion Valuation (Bloomberg)
Google updates Gmail for Android and iOS with new summary cards that are more glanceable and actionable and a new "Happening soon" section above the inbox (Abner Li/9to5Google)
